      public void setPlusStation()

    • generateStations

      public void generateStations​(int nStations, int nSlots) throws java.text.ParseException
      Generate the stations of a system
      参数:
      nStations - number of stations
      nSlots - number of slots in a station
      抛出:
      java.text.ParseException

    • distributeBikes

      public void distributeBikes​(int nBikes) throws java.text.ParseException
      Distribute bikes in the stations with mechanical bike's ratio of 0.7
      参数:
      nBikes - number of bikes
      抛出:
      java.text.ParseException

    • setup

      public java.lang.String setup​(int nStations, int nSlots, int nBikes) throws java.text.ParseException
      Setup the station of a given system
      参数:
      nStations - number of the stations in this system
      nSlots - number of the slots in a station
      nBikes - initial number of bikes in a station
      返回:
      抛出:
      java.text.ParseException

    • addUser

      public java.lang.String addUser​(java.lang.String username, RegistrationCard card)
      Add the user to a system, called by CLUI
      参数:
      username - name of user
      card - card type of user
      返回:
      result in CLUI

    • offline

      public java.lang.String offline​(int stationID) throws InvalidIDException
      Offline a station
      参数:
      stationID - ID of the station that we want to set offline
      返回:
      result in CLUI
      抛出:
      InvalidIDException - no such a ID in the system

    • online

      public java.lang.String online​(int stationID) throws InvalidIDException
      Online a station
      参数:
      stationID - of which we want to set online
      返回:
      result in CLUI
      抛出:
      InvalidIDException - no such a ID in the system

    • rentbike

      public java.lang.String rentbike​(int userID, int stationID) throws InvalidIDException, VacancyException, RentMoreThanOneBikeException
      Rent a bike in a system
      参数:
      userID - user's ID in the system
      stationID - ID of the station
      返回:
      result in CLUI
      抛出:
      InvalidIDException - no such a ID in the system
      VacancyException - don't have a bike
      RentMoreThanOneBikeException - One user can't rent more than one bike

    • returnbike

      public java.lang.String returnbike​(int userID, int stationID, java.lang.String str) throws java.text.ParseException, InvalidIDException, NoneParkingSlotException, EndPriorToStartException, NoBikeToReturnException
      return the bike in a system
      参数:
      userID - ID of the user
      stationID - of the station
      str - Time in string shape
      返回:
      result inC CLUI
      抛出:
      java.text.ParseException
      InvalidIDException - no such a ID in the system
      NoneParkingSlotException - no more free slot in that station
      EndPriorToStartException - should end a session before renting a new bike
      NoBikeToReturnException - no bike to return

    • displayStation

      public java.lang.String displayStation​(int ID) throws java.text.ParseException
      Display the station status
      参数:
      ID - of the station we want to inspect
      返回:
      the state of the station, online/offline, plus/not
      抛出:
      java.text.ParseException

    • displayrecords

      public java.lang.String displayrecords()
      Display the records of each session of a user
      返回:
      each session of a user: start/end station, duration and price

    • displayUser

      public java.lang.String displayUser​(int ID)
      Display the status of a user
      参数:
      ID - of the user
      返回:
      credit, total rent number, total duration and total charge
